query:
-- عرض جميع القيود على جدول profiles
SELECT 
    conname AS constraint_name,
    contype AS constraint_type,
    pg_get_constraintdef(oid) AS definition
FROM pg_constraint 
WHERE conrelid = 'public.profiles'::regclass;
